channel.title: CNET News
channel.description: CNET news editors and reporters provide top technology news, with investigative reporting and in-depth coverage of tech issues and events.

item.title: The history of Airbus under one huge roof - CNET
item.description: The Aeroscopia Aeronautical Museum in Toulouse, France houses incredible aircraft from Airbus and more, including two Concordes, an A300 and a Super Guppy.
item.dc:creator: Kent German

item.title: Meet young Dumbledore in upcoming 'Fantastic Beasts' films - CNET
item.description: Jude Law will take on the role of Harry Potter's beloved Hogwarts headmaster when the film series returns.
item.dc:creator: Gael Fashingbauer Cooper

item.title: Google Home won't let Burger King have it its way - CNET
item.description: Commentary: A new commercial tries to trigger Google's smart speaker into talking about Whoppers. But the trick doesn't last for long.
item.dc:creator: Chris Matyszczyk

item.title: Holy Marvel-DC rivalry! Batman reacts to 'Thor' trailer - CNET
item.description: Bruce Wayne is not thrilled with the news that "Thor: Ragnarok" is coming out two weeks before "Justice League."
item.dc:creator: Gael Fashingbauer Cooper

item.title: Google's Android Pay adds banks, helps you spend your money - CNET
item.description: Now you can link the mobile payments service with your accounts at Bank of America, Bank of New Zealand, Discover and more.
item.dc:creator: Dara Kerr

item.title: Thanos, oops I mean, Josh Brolin to play Cable in Deadpool 2 - CNET
item.description: Because playing the main villain of the Marvel universe just wasn't enough, now Josh Brolin is teaming up with the Merc with a Mouth.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Brackmann

item.title: ​Facebook Messenger hits 1.2B users, that's a lot of people - CNET
item.description: The social network's messaging app is now twice as big as Instagram and has as many users as WhatsApp.
item.dc:creator: Dara Kerr

item.title: Apple snapped up Hover Camera's selfie drone for an exclusive - CNET
item.description: Joining drone makers DJI, Parrot and GoPro, the foldable flying camera will be available as an exclusive bundle on Apple.com and in Apple stores.
item.dc:creator: Joshua Goldman

item.title: 2017 Jeep Compass totally biffs it on auto show 'off-road' course - Roadshow
item.description: Rain, metal grates and standard tires don't get along very well.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Krok

item.title: Trippy NASA image shows dramatic Mars mesa - CNET
item.description: The Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter zeroes in on a fascinating mesa that looks beautiful and alien at the same time.
item.dc:creator: Amanda Kooser

item.title: Shrimp named for Pink Floyd: Shine on, you crazy crustacean - CNET
item.description: The pink-clawed pistol shrimp, an unusual-looking new critter, gets a nifty name as a tribute to rock band Pink Floyd.
item.dc:creator: Amanda Kooser

item.title: ​Airbnb: We collect taxes too - CNET
item.description: Just in time for Tax Day, the home rental service says it now has agreements with hundreds of governments worldwide to collect and remit taxes.
item.dc:creator: Dara Kerr

item.title: LG Pay could maybe use your face to send mobile payments - CNET
item.description: The LG G6 flagship phone's face unlock feature could tie into LG Pay.
item.dc:creator: Gordon Gottsegen

item.title: Honda Miimo is a robot that will mow your lawn - Roadshow
item.description: For the low, low price of "a lot of money," you can skip the whole mow-it-yourself thing.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Krok

item.title: April the giraffe says stop questioning my pregnancy - CNET
item.description: Or at least that's what her zookeepers say anyway. They urge webcam viewers to be patient; the calf will come out when it's ready.
item.dc:creator: Gael Fashingbauer Cooper

item.title: 17 photos from one of the scariest Instagram accounts - CNET
item.description: There's a lot of great photography on Instagram, but this account is probably the most likely to put you on edge.
item.dc:creator: Jason Parker

item.title: Star Wars Battlefront II trailer leaks - CNET
item.description: EA's latest Battlefront title brings Darth Maul, Yoda, Kylo Ren and Rey into one game.
item.dc:creator: Morgan Little

item.title: Internet giants roar back against net neutrality teardown - CNET
item.description: Consumer groups, Democrats and now Silicon Valley are lining up to protect net neutrality rules as the Republican FCC chairman prepares to knock them down.
item.dc:creator: Marguerite Reardon

item.title: Hacking Nintendo's Switch could score you $20,000 - CNET
item.description: Nintendo launched a bug-hunt for its Switch gaming console, looking for ways to pirate or cheat -- and it's dangling a reward of up to $20,000.
item.dc:creator: Joan E. Solsman

item.title: Star Wars' John Boyega comes back to Earth with 'Detroit' - CNET
item.description: Oscar-winning director Kathryn Bigelow slowly ratchets up the tension in first trailer for film about the 1967 riots.
item.dc:creator: Gael Fashingbauer Cooper

item.title: Galaxy S8's Bixby delayed, but do you care? (The 3:59, Ep. 209) - CNET
item.description: Fitbit's smartwatch might also be delayed and Amazon lets you spy on your kids' viewing habits.
item.dc:creator: Roger Cheng

item.title: 'Transformers: Last Knight' trailer rewrites history - CNET
item.description: "The Last Knight" shifts back and forth in time and shows more of that huge Optimus Prime-Bumblebee battle.
item.dc:creator: Gael Fashingbauer Cooper

item.title: Mark Hamill and Daisy Ridley plug Star Wars charity contest - CNET
item.description: Appear in the new Han Solo movie, attend "The Last Jedi" premiere or visit Skywalker Ranch -- all while raising money for Omaze.
item.dc:creator: Bonnie Burton

item.title: Microsoft sets May 2 for (Surface-less) New York event - CNET
item.description: The company will hold an event in New York featuring CEO Satya Nadella, but don't expect to get a glimpse of a new Surface Pro tablet.
item.dc:creator: Joan E. Solsman

item.title: ​New Edge browser brings next-gen web to your Windows PC - CNET
item.description: Microsoft's latest browser, part of Windows 10 Creators Update, adds new web tech for virtual reality, video chatting and better online gaming.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Shankland
